verbose_text: The patient 's chest tube output had become serous in nature while he was kept NPO for his trial of conservative management, so olive oil and 60 mL of cream were administered through a nasogastric tube at the time of skin incision for the thoracotomy to stimulate the flow of chyle and aid in the identification of the leak.
